    • loadLogs

      public static ArrayList<String> loadLogs(int mode, String zeroMode)
      Loads log/list records from file and formats them for printing mode 1 : lending history mode 2 : currently borrowed list mode 3 : current request list default : provide file name
      Parameters:
      mode - read mode
      zeroMode - optional filename with mode 0
      Returns:
      formatted history list
